parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version1 </name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Time

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Command is disabled in multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Set simulation acceleration coefficient. May also be used to slow time in cutscenes.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[setAccTime]] accFactor

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> accFactor: [[Number]] - Factor. Value is clamped to 1/128 - 4

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setAccTime]] 0.1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[accTime]], [[setTimeMultiplier]], [[timeMultiplier]], [[useAudioTimeForMoves]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:58</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">''Notes from before the conversion:''

A good habit to get into is setting the [[accTime]] to 1 at the start of all cutscenes, in case the [[player]] is running at 4x speed when the scene starts.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
